title: Add-ons: Impossible to get passed the confirm backup authentication code stage
content:
Hi everyone,

I have been stuck for 3 days now and tried everything to get pass the authentication process.

I want to submit an Add on. On my profile page, 2 step authentication is enabled.

When i click submit new add-on, i am directed to the Enable two-step authentication page anyway. So ok i'll do that:

"Scan authentication code to continue to ⁨Add-ons⁩"

So i use google authenticator. And im able to continue.

Then im presented with "Save backup authentication codes", so i download them and store them.

PROBLEM:

On the next page, in need to "Confirm backup authentication code". ANY code i try, that was given to me in the previous step, doesn't work.

Error: There was a problem confirming your backup authentication code.

  • not using caps or whatever
  • no spaces in there
  • tried all the codes
  • tried different browsers
  • The time and date are correct on both phone and windows 10

I have NO clue what to do anymore. I can't get passed it. Can someone please advice. (see screenshots)
creator: hashraiders

title: Video player gradients broken in fullscreen
content:
On any video player that has a gradient, it breaks when I full-screen the video, showing as solid semi-opaque bars instead of the intended gradients.

This happens on any video player I've used that has a gradient, and is most noticeable on YouTube due to the double gradient.

It displays normally when I use snipping tool, so apologies for the bad quality on the second image.

I use Ublock Origin and Dark Reader, but this behaviour doesn't change when either is disabled.

title: Claude.ai extension still available?
content:
I had an extension that gave me access to Claude.ai. It was working quite well until this morning, when its CPU shot through the roof. I shut down its tab. I could not figure out how to restart it, and it's not in my extensions list. Was that deprecated? Is there still a direct interface to Claude.ai on Firefox?

I pulled up About:Firefox, and it informs I must restart to update it. That was news to me.

I could also (before restart), do successive Control-T presses to resurrect my Claude.ai. I will try that before restart. Could you tell me what I should look for in the Claude.ai tab, or elsewhere, if Control-T is successful? Thanks,

title: turkish airlines houston office
content: Group travel services are another area where the Turkish Airlines Houston office excels. Whether coordinating a school trip, a sports team’s international tour, a cultural exchange program, or a religious pilgrimage, the office supports bulk bookings with dedicated attention and professionalism. Travelers receive customized itineraries, group fare options, seat assignments, and baggage coordination, making the process seamless for both group leaders and participants. The office ensures that documentation is in order, travel policies are understood, and all passengers have access to the information and support they need for a successful journey. The strategic significance of the Turkish Airlines Houston office also extends to its role in community engagement and branding. By establishing a physical presence in one of the most vibrant cities in the southern United States, Turkish Airlines affirms its commitment to connecting Houston’s diverse residents to the rest of the world. The office participates in cultural events, travel expos, and business forums, promoting the airline’s values of hospitality, connectivity, and service excellence. This brand presence not only reinforces Turkish Airlines’ position as a leader in international aviation but also strengthens its relationship with Houston’s multicultural communities, business sectors, and academic institutions. As international travel becomes more complex due to changing visa regulations, health protocols, and global mobility trends, the Turkish Airlines Houston office serves as a beacon of clarity. The team stays up to date with the latest requirements for entry and transit, advising travelers on necessary documentation, vaccination records, and travel insurance. This proactive guidance is particularly crucial for travelers connecting through Istanbul en route to countries with varying entry conditions. The Houston office also supports passengers in understanding transit times, visa waiver rules, and layover options such as Turkish Airlines’ free Stopover or Touristanbul programs, which allow eligible passengers to explore Istanbul during extended layovers. With a growing demand for personalized and dependable airline service, the Turkish Airlines Houston office remains a vital partner in shaping world-class travel experiences. Its staff are trained to deliver both efficiency and empathy, ensuring that every interaction—whether in-person, over the phone, or via email—reflects the airline’s global standards. Whether you’re a first-time flyer or a seasoned traveler, the office offers consistent value through accurate information, prompt service, and thoughtful problem-solving. In today’s fast-paced and ever-evolving travel landscape, having a trusted local resource like the Turkish Airlines Houston office makes all the difference in ensuring travel remains a source of excitement, not stress. In conclusion, the Turkish Airlines Houston office is more than just a regional extension of an international airline—it’s a travel ally for anyone embarking on a global journey. It embodies Turkish Airlines’ commitment to exceptional service, operational excellence, and cultural understanding. From helping customers find the best routes and fares to supporting them through every stage of their travel, the Houston office brings global reach to a local level. With Turkish Airlines connecting Houston to the world through Istanbul, the possibilities are endless—and it all starts with the dedicated team at the Turkish Airlines Houston office.

title: Flydubai Dubai office
content: The Flydubai Dubai office is also instrumental in supporting travelers with special needs and requirements. Whether it's arranging wheelchair services, oxygen equipment, special meal requests, or assistance for elderly passengers, the office ensures that all policies are explained thoroughly and that arrangements are made in compliance with the airline's service standards. Travelers with medical conditions, limited mobility, or sensory impairments often rely on the expertise of the Dubai team to ensure a dignified and smooth travel experience. Moreover, the office provides timely support for families with infants and young children, guiding them on family-friendly services, stroller policies, and seating preferences for maximum comfort. Beyond customer service, the Flydubai Dubai office also handles queries related to group bookings, education travel, religious tourism, and leisure packages. For tour operators, schools, and travel agencies, the Dubai office acts as a liaison for negotiating group fares, blocking seats in bulk, managing travel itineraries, and ensuring documentation compliance. Whether it’s coordinating a group of students heading to a competition or a pilgrimage group bound for Jeddah, the Flydubai Dubai office provides efficient logistical support backed by years of operational experience. Its responsiveness and ability to personalize group travel solutions make it a preferred partner for bulk travel planning. Additionally, the Flydubai Dubai office supports the airline’s digital ecosystem by helping less tech-savvy travelers navigate online platforms. While Flydubai’s mobile app and website are robust and user-friendly, many customers still prefer in-person support for mobile check-ins, digital boarding passes, flight status notifications, and managing their bookings. The Dubai office bridges this gap by offering tech-assisted walk-throughs and ensuring that passengers feel confident using Flydubai’s online tools for future travel. This blend of high-tech and high-touch support enhances passenger empowerment while maintaining the warmth of personalized customer care. From a branding standpoint, the Flydubai Dubai office also serves as a physical representation of the airline’s commitment to regional leadership, innovation, and excellence in service. With Dubai being a globally recognized center for trade, tourism, and innovation, the Flydubai office embodies these values by offering a modern, customer-centric experience in tune with the city’s energy and pace. The staff are multilingual, culturally sensitive, and professionally trained to meet the expectations of a diverse clientele—from business executives to holidaymakers, expatriates to local residents. This international focus is further reflected in the office’s flexible hours, prompt responses, and consistent service standards.

title: turkish airlines london office
content: With the growing emphasis on travel sustainability and eco-conscious flying, the Turkish Airlines London office also supports initiatives aligned with the airline’s environmental goals. Turkish Airlines has been investing in fuel-efficient aircraft and green operations, and the London office contributes by educating passengers on carbon offset programs, digital boarding passes, and paperless ticketing. In this way, the office serves as a local ambassador for the airline’s global vision of sustainable aviation. It also plays a role in coordinating corporate social responsibility efforts, including student travel programs, charitable partnerships, and emergency travel assistance during global events. Another important aspect of the Turkish Airlines London office is its integration with the airline’s loyalty program, Miles&Smiles. Frequent flyers can receive support with account issues, mile redemption, status upgrades, and exclusive partner offers through the London office. This direct access to loyalty management empowers customers to maximize their benefits and enhance their overall flying experience. Members are guided through the process of earning and spending miles on flights, hotel bookings, car rentals, and lifestyle purchases—transforming travel into a rewarding journey every time. Travelers also turn to the Turkish Airlines London office for assistance during disruptions, such as strikes, weather delays, or travel restrictions. In uncertain times, having a reliable point of contact is invaluable, and the London office serves that role with professionalism and efficiency. From arranging alternative travel routes to processing refunds or vouchers, the staff ensure that customers remain informed and supported throughout the process. Their local presence means quicker response times and a better understanding of regional passenger expectations, making a significant difference during time-sensitive situations. Moreover, the Turkish Airlines London office supports group bookings, educational tours, and large-scale travel arrangements for organizations and institutions. Schools, businesses, and tour operators frequently engage with the office to coordinate logistics for international travel, ensuring compliance with airline policies and achieving cost-effective planning. Dedicated agents assist with documentation, group fare negotiations, and customized scheduling, streamlining the process for organizers. This specialized service makes the London office a preferred partner for bulk travel coordination in the UK.

title: Mozilla will provide security updates for Firefox 115 ESR until at least 115.27.0esr in August 2025
content:
Hi Mozilla Team / Community,

We understand that Firefox 115 ESR will receive security updates until at least version 115.27.0esr in August 2025.

We currently have a number of devices still running Windows 7 for legacy application reasons and rely on Firefox 115 ESR as it's the last version to support that OS.

We need to plan ahead, so could you please confirm:

Will Mozilla continue to support Windows 7 with Firefox 115 ESR updates until August 2025?

Or is support for Windows 7 ending sooner, even if 115 ESR itself continues?

title: FF 140.0 - How to disable new "Manage use of DRM Software" icon in browser bar?
content:
Ever since upgrading to FF 140 yesterday, there is a new icon labeled "Manage use of DRM Software" in the browser just left of the URL, which violently shakes every time I open a website that requires approval to play DRM content.

Now, I do not play any DRM content and have deactivated anything related in the settings, yet every time I open e.g. discord.com where users might embed music or videos in chat rooms (that are optional and ignored by me) that silly icon starts shaking again, which is super annoying.

Is there a way to remove it altogether, or AT LEAST disable the shaking?

title: After last windows update this week Microsoft Family safety settings STOP Firefox from starting
content:
After my last Windows 10 update this week, suddenly, Microsoft Family safety settings STOP Firefox from starting up! Can't start Firefox. DRASTIC! DEVASTATING So I HAD to import everything from Firefox to Edge browser, just to send this message. But I left Firefox as my default browser. I am the head my Family group in Family Safety settings.

After clicking on Firefox I get the following message from Family Safety: "You can't use Firefox because of your family safety settings, but it doesn't hurt to ask" Then there's a place to click on: ASK TO USE(Firefox) 

  Before clicking on this I removed internet access to my machine. ASK TO USE is a permission FROM Microsoft that never comes if clicked on. These people have HIJACKED my ability to use Firefox.

They should be sued.

title: Urgent Assistance Required – Phishing Incident Involving Removed Addon
content:
Good afternoon,

My name is Ivan Prokopiev, and I need urgent assistance.

On June 19, 2025, I installed a Coinbase-related addon from provider "wallet" (it was on the first lines of search results). Unfortunately, this turned out to be a phishing application, and it has since been removed. As a result, I’ve had over $80,000 stolen from my wallet (June 19, 2025. 17-20).

I am asking for your help in identifying or contacting the provider of this malicious addon. I would like to try recovering at least part of the stolen funds.

Regrettably, I do not have a screenshot or any direct proof of the addon I installed. If you have access to any logs or records that could confirm its presence or details, I would greatly appreciate it. Alternatively, could you guide me on how I might locate this information in my browser history or logs?

Thank you in advance for your support.

Sincerely, Ivan Prokopiev my email sham4ik2010@gmail.com

---

Let me know if you’re sending this to a specific company (e.g., the wallet provider), and I can tailor it more precisely.

title: Nové menu … programu Firefox
content: Hezký den Měl jsem svůj iPad v opravně na výměnu baterky. Vše jsem smazal. Po obnovení ze zálohy mě překvapilo že místo hamburger menu jsem měl menu s … A to i přesto, že iPad a ostatní svá zařízení aktualizuji. A teď k mému požadavku: používám iPad na šířku. V menu jsem více jak hodinu hledal “odeslat panel do jiných zařízení”. Víte co je špatně? Menu ma jinak položky a není vidět, že se dá scrolovat dolu. Chybí tam třeba šipečka. Prohledal jsem nápovědu, ptal jsem se různých ai. Myslím si, že nebudu sám. Položka byla dole níže než v základní pohledu a netušil jsem, že menu je scrolovatelné - předtím nebylo nebo všechny prvky, co jsem používal byly videť. Tomáš - produktový manažer telko
